org.universAAL.ui.dm.ui.preferences.editor

Class UIPreferencesUICaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.middleware.bus.member.BusMember
      • org.universAAL.middleware.bus.member.Caller
        • org.universAAL.middleware.ui.UICaller
          • org.universAAL.ui.dm.ui.preferences.editor.UIPreferencesUICaller

  • public class UIPreferencesUICaller
extends org.universAAL.middleware.ui.UICaller
    UI Preferences Editor dialog provider. Sends UIRequest containing the Form with UI Preferences and handles UIResponse so that it stores to the Profiling Server UI Preferences related information; it also refreshes local buffer containing that data)
    Author:
    eandgrg
